item.title: Flipkart kicks off 2025 with ‘Big Bachat Days’ sale: Discounts on iPhone 16 series, Pixel 9, Galaxy Z Fold 6 and more | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Flipkart kicks off 2025 with ‘Big Bachat Days’ sale: Discounts on iPhone 16 series, Pixel 9, Galaxy Z Fold 6 and more

Date: January 1, 2025 | Source: Live Mint

Walmart-owned Flipkart has kicked off its 'Big Bachat Days' sale, providing enticing discounts on a variety of smartphones from January 1 to January 5, 2025.

  • Discounts of up to ₹7,000 on Apple’s iPhone 16 series.
  • Google’s Pixel 9 series discounted by up to ₹10,000.
  • Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 discounted by ₹12,500.
  • EMI plans of up to 24 months offered for HDFC Bank cardholders.
  • Sale includes offers on various brands like Motorola, Xiaomi, and Vivo.
“The iPhone 16 Pro Max (256GB) is available for ₹137,900, down from ₹144,900.”

In conclusion, Flipkart's 'Big Bachat Days' sale offers significant savings for smartphone buyers looking to upgrade their devices in early 2025.

item.title: Fitness expert shares four tips for those setting weight loss goals for the new year - The Times of India
item.description:
Fitness Expert's Four Tips for Effective Weight Loss in the New Year

Published on: January 1, 2025, Source: Times of India

As the new year begins, many people set weight loss goals. Fitness coach Lizzy High offers four effective and sustainable tips to help individuals achieve their weight loss objectives.

  • The 30-80-30 rule of diet: Quick, home-cooked meals, 80% whole foods, and 30 grams of protein per meal.
  • Daily movement: Incorporate physical activity, such as brisk walking, light stretching, or a quick workout, into your daily routine.
  • Mindset: Develop mental resilience, practice patience, and show self-compassion during the weight loss journey.
  • Small swaps: Make minor lifestyle changes, like cooking at home, prioritizing self-care, and managing stress, to enhance both physical and mental health.

Lizzy emphasizes the importance of consistency and a growth-oriented mindset in achieving long-term weight loss success.

item.title: Poco X7 5G series launch date confirmed: Key features and specifications revealed - India TV News
item.description:
Poco X7 5G Series Launch Date Confirmed: Key Features and Specifications Revealed

Publication Date: January 2025 Source: India TV News

The Poco X7 5G series is all set to launch in India on January 9, featuring the Poco X7 5G and Poco X7 Pro 5G models. The devices will be available on Flipkart, showcasing exciting design elements and robust specifications.

  • The Poco X7 5G includes a centrally located squircle-shaped rear camera and may be available in silver and green.
  • The Poco X7 Pro features a pill-shaped camera module and could sport a dual-tone black and green finish.
  • Performance is powered by MediaTek processors: Dimensity 8400-Ultra for the Pro and Dimensity 7300-Ultra for the standard model.
  • The Pro model is expected to have a 50MP primary camera, while the standard version may include a 20MP front camera for selfies.
  • Both phones are expected to have IP68 water and dust resistance ratings.
  • Display specifications include a 6.67-inch AMOLED with 120Hz refresh rate for both models, and battery capacities of 5,110mAh for the X7 and 6,000mAh for the Pro.
"The Poco X7 5G series is expected to make a big splash in the Indian market upon its release."

With a combination of compelling specifications and attractive design, the Poco X7 5G series aims to attract a significant audience upon its launch.

item.title: Lucknow: Agra man shoots chilling video after killing mother, 4 sisters at hotel, explains reason behind murders - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Lucknow Tragedy: Man Kills Mother and Four Sisters, Claims to Protect Family

Date & Source: January 1, 2025, Hindustan Times

Lucknow woke up to a horrifying incident where a 24-year-old man, Arshad, allegedly murdered his mother and four sisters at a hotel, claiming he acted to "protect" his family from neighbors who planned to sell his sisters in Hyderabad.

  1. The family, originally from Agra, had been staying at the hotel since December 30 to celebrate New Year.
  2. Arshad served his family food and alcohol laced with intoxicants before killing them.
  3. Arshad recorded a video after the crime, explaining his actions and showing the bodies.
  4. Police have detained Arshad, and his father remains at large.

"Our neighbours were trying to take over our property and planned to sell my sisters in Hyderabad. I couldn’t let that happen," Arshad purportedly said in the video.

Police are reviewing CCTV camera footage to trace Arshad’s father and bring him to justice.

item.title: India ace goes past Ashwin’s all-time record in Test rankings - ICC Cricket
item.description:
Zimbabwe's Williams and Ervine Shine in Test Rankings; Nissanka and Santner Move Up in T20Is

Published on: [Date] - Source: ICC Cricket

Sean Williams and Craig Ervine have made significant gains in the latest MRF Tyres ICC Men's Test Player Rankings, with Williams breaking into the top 20 for the first time in his career. Meanwhile, T20I series between New Zealand and Sri Lanka saw Pathum Nissanka and Mitchell Santner making strides in the ICC Men's T20I Player Rankings.

  1. Sean Williams jumps 10 places to 19th in Test rankings with 653 rating points, his best since Brendan Taylor in 2014.
  2. Craig Ervine moves up five places to equal 47th position in Test rankings.
  3. Brian Bennett enters the top 100 Test bowlers after his maiden five-wicket haul.
  4. Pathum Nissanka gains three places to close in on the top five batters in T20I rankings.
  5. Mitchell Santner jumps into the top 10 of the T20I bowling rankings.

These moves reflect the growing competitiveness and depth of Zimbabwe's Test side and the exciting performances in the ongoing T20I series.

item.title: 'Gave alcohol, slit their wrists': Man kills mother, 4 sisters in Lucknow hotel; father aided murders - The Times of India
item.description:
‘Gave alcohol, slit their wrists’: Man kills mother, 4 sisters in Lucknow hotel; father aided murders

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

This shocking incident in Lucknow has led to the tragic loss of a mother and her four daughters, with the perpetrator and evidence of complicity from the father revealing deep family issues.

  • A man reportedly intoxicated his mother and sisters before committing the murders.
  • The father is accused of aiding in the heinous acts.
  • The case has raised questions about domestic violence and mental health.
“It was a nightmare; we never imagined something so horrific could happen in our family,” said a close family friend.

This incident highlights the urgent need for better mental health support and domestic violence prevention measures.

item.title: Ileana D'Cruz sparks pregnancy rumors with New Year post - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Ileana D'Cruz Sparks Pregnancy Rumors with New Year Post

Date: Not specified - Source: Times of India

Actress Ileana D’Cruz has ignited pregnancy rumors with her latest New Year post, leaving fans speculating that she might be expecting her second child with her husband, Michael Dolan. The couple, who welcomed their first child, Koa, in August 2023, is now the center of attention again after Ileana's emotional post on Instagram.

On Wednesday morning, Ileana took to her social media handle to reflect on 2024 and welcome 2025, sharing a heartwarming video compilation featuring one clip from each month of the year. The video captured cherished moments from her life, but it was the clip from October 2024 that stole the spotlight. In the snippet, Ileana appeared visibly emotional as she held up a pregnancy test kit, sparking curiosity and excitement among her followers.

  1. The clip from October 2024 showed Ileana with a pregnancy test kit.
  2. Fans speculated about a possible second pregnancy after seeing the clip.
  3. Neither Ileana nor Michael has made an official announcement yet.
"Are you pregnant again?" - fan comment on Ileana's post

While the actress refrained from explicitly mentioning a second pregnancy, the October clip left fans buzzing with questions. Several followers took to the comments section to express their thoughts, with one user writing, "Are you pregnant again?", while another exclaimed, "Wait…October…congratulations again!!!"

item.title: NASA Unveils New Mars Drone Design: A Larger, Enhanced Version Of Ingenuity Helicopter - NDTV
item.description:
NASA Unveils New Mars Drone Design: A Larger, Enhanced Version Of Ingenuity Helicopter

Publication Date: October 2023, Source: NDTV

NASA has unveiled the successor to its successful Ingenuity helicopter that has operated on Mars for over three years. The new drone, nicknamed the "Mars Chopper," has enhanced capabilities for scientific exploration.

This advanced drone is larger, weighing around the size of an SUV, and boasts a payload capacity of five kilograms for scientific instruments.

  • The Mars Chopper can fly up to three kilometers and carry advanced imaging and analysis equipment.
  • It is designed to help scientists study large areas of terrain quickly, especially regions inaccessible to rovers.
  • Ingenuity, which weighed 1.8 kilograms, performed 72 flights far exceeding its original mission parameters.
"Scientists could use Chopper to study large swaths of terrain in detail, quickly – including areas where rovers cannot safely travel," NASA stated.

Despite its improvements, the new model faces challenges following Ingenuity's crash due to navigation issues amidst the Martian terrain.

The Mars Chopper represents a major advancement in planetary exploration technology and the potential for future missions beyond Mars.

item.title: Poco X7 5G Series Launch Date Confirmed: Check Out Specifications - ABP Live
item.description:
Poco X7 5G Series Launch Date Confirmed: Check Out Specifications

Publication Date: January 2, 2025 Source: Poco Official Announcement

The Poco X7 5G series, including the X7 and X7 Pro models, is set to launch on January 9 in India, with availability through Flipkart. Details about the design and specifications have been revealed prior to the launch.

  • Launch Date: January 9, 2025
  • Models: Poco X7 5G and Poco X7 Pro 5G
  • Purchase Platform: Flipkart
  • Design: Distinct styles with colors like black, yellow, silver, and green
  • Processor: X7 Pro will feature MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra; base model to have Dimensity 7300-Ultra
  • Camera: Expected 50-megapixel main camera; Pro may get Sony IMX882 sensor
  • Display: 6.67-inch AMOLED with high resolution and refresh rate
  • Battery: X7 5G will have 5,110mAh; the Pro variant features a 6,000mAh battery
“With an array of powerful features and striking designs, the Poco X7 5G series is poised to capture attention when it launches early this year.”

In conclusion, the Poco X7 series is highly anticipated due to its innovative features and design, aiming to draw significant interest upon release.

item.title: Naga Vamsi says he wasn't disrespectful towards Boney Kapoor: ‘Don't need to teach us how to respect elders' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Naga Vamsi says he wasn't disrespectful towards Boney Kapoor: ‘Don't need to teach us how to respect elders'

Date: Jan 01, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

During a recent roundtable chat, producer Naga Vamsi denied claims of disrespect towards Boney Kapoor while discussing the influence of south cinema on Bollywood.

  • Vamsi clarified there was 'no disrespect' during the conversation.
  • He claimed that Boney is more respected in the south than in Bollywood.
  • Vamsi highlighted how south Indian cinema has evolved and influenced Bollywood.
  • The discussion led to social media backlash and critiques from industry peers.
Naga Vamsi stated, “You don’t need to teach us how to respect elders, we respect boney ji more than u guys do and there was no disrespect towards boney ji in that conversation…”

The exchange signals ongoing tensions and dialogues between south Indian cinema and Bollywood, showing a growing recognition of regional influences in the film industry.

item.title: Bharat Ratna Demand For Manmohan Singh Gains Momentum After Telangana Assembly Resolution - News18
item.description:
Demand for Bharat Ratna for Manmohan Singh Grows After Telangana Assembly Resolution

Date: January 01, 2025 | Source: News18

The Telangana Assembly has urged the Central government to confer the Bharat Ratna on former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh, prompting many in Congress to support the initiative. Congress leaders are calling for the highest civilian award to honor his significant contributions.

  • Telangana Assembly passes a resolution demanding Bharat Ratna for Manmohan Singh.
  • Congress Deputy Leader in the Rajya Sabha, Pramod Tiwari, emphasizes the need to acknowledge Singh's leadership.
  • Subharansh Kumar Rai mentions Singh's advocacy for key legislation such as the Right to Education and Right to Information.
  • BJP criticizes Congress for not acting on a previous recommendation to award Singh the Bharat Ratna.
  • Manmohan Singh recently passed away at the age of 92.
“I urge the Centre to accept the resolution. Manmohanji was a great leader of our country and he should be awarded the Bharat Ratna.” - Pramod Tiwari

The push for the Bharat Ratna for Manmohan Singh highlights his acknowledged role in shaping modern India, suggesting a broader recognition of his legacy may be underway.

item.title: Top Stock Picks For 2025: Bajaj Broking lists these five broader market shares - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Top Stock Picks for 2025

Publication Date: Not specified   |   Source: Bajaj Broking

Bajaj Broking expects the Nifty 50 index to reach 28,700 by the end of 2025, indicating a 19% upside. The brokerage outlines five stock picks projected to rise between 20% to 40% in value.

  • Bajaj Broking forecasts a 19% upside on the Nifty 50 index.
  • The report lists five key stocks as top picks for 2025.
  • Sectors highlighted for potential outperforming include IT, Defence, Hospitals, Banks, and Telecom.
  • Stocks like Metals, Finance, and Pharma are identified as bargain buys.
  • The firm has an underweight rating on FMCG stocks.
“Bajaj Broking recommends buying stocks within specified price ranges for significant potential upside.”

The insights from Bajaj Broking suggest careful stock selection can yield positive returns as they project growth across multiple sectors.

item.title: 6 Very Beautiful Images Of Nebula Captured By NASA Hubble Space Telescope - Times Now
item.description:
6 Very Beautiful Images Of Nebula Captured By NASA Hubble Space Telescope

Date: Jan 1, 2025 Source: Times Now

This article showcases six breathtaking images of nebulas taken by the NASA Hubble Space Telescope, highlighting their beauty and cosmic significance.

  • The Ghost Nebula (IC 63) is both a reflection and emission nebula about 550 light-years away.
  • The Horsehead Nebula, also known as Barnard 33, is located in the Orion constellation.
  • The Eagle Nebula features a towering structure of gas and dust that serves as a stellar nursery.
  • The Orion Nebula offers a view of a star-forming region containing over 3,000 stars.
  • The Lagoon Nebula (Messier 8) is a massive cloud of glowing gas recognized for its stellar nursery attributes.
  • The article includes captivating visuals and details about each nebula, emphasizing their ethereal beauty and cosmic relevance.
"These breathtaking images showcase the awe-inspiring beauty and intricate details of nebulae."

The Hubble Space Telescope continues to provide invaluable insights into the cosmos, unveiling the splendor of nebulas across the universe.

item.title: Suzlon Energy share price rises 4% post various business updates | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Suzlon Energy Share Price Rises 4% Post Various Business Updates

Publication Date: [Insert Publication Date] Source: Livemint

In morning trades on Wednesday, Suzlon Energy’s share price increased by up to 4% following announcements regarding business updates, including rating upgrades and penalty cancellations.

Key Points

  • CRISIL upgraded the ratings for SE Forge Ltd, a subsidiary of Suzlon, improving its long-term rating from 'CRISIL BBB- / Stable' to 'CRISIL BBB+ / Positive'.
  • The total loan facilities rated by CRISIL for SE Forge Ltd is ₹205.45 crore.
  • National Faceless Penalty Centre's penalty of ₹260.35 crore for FY 2015-16 and FY 2016-17 was cancelled.
  • Suzlon Energy's share price opened at ₹62.89 on the BSE, reaching a peak of ₹64.67 during intraday trading.
  • Despite past corrections, the stock is still up more than six times compared to two years ago.
  • CEO S. Venkata Subramaniam announced resignation effective December 31, 2024.
"The stock has given multibagger returns to investors over the past two years."

In conclusion, the positive updates regarding rating upgrades and the cancellation of penalties have contributed to a rise in Suzlon Energy's share price, attracting investor interest.

item.title: Flipkart 'Big Bachat Days' sale: Deals and offers on iPhones, Pixels, more - Business Standard
item.description:
Flipkart 'Big Bachat Days' sale: Deals and offers on iPhones, Pixels, more

Date: Jan 01 2025 | Source: Business Standard

E-commerce platform Flipkart is offering significant discounts on various smartphones as part of its "Big Bachat Days" sale from January 1 to January 5.

  • Offers include cashback, UPI discounts, and no-interest EMI options.
  • Apple's iPhone 16 series models available with discounts up to Rs 7000.
  • Google Pixel 9 series smartphones can have bank discounts of up to Rs 10,000.
  • Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 maximizes savings with discounts of Rs 12,500 with select banks.
"Customers can avail a discount of Rs 2000 on UPI transactions for purchasing an iPhone 16 series model."

The sale promises extensive offers across popular smartphone brands, ensuring customers receive excellent value for their purchases.

item.title: "What Happens In Dressing Room...": Irfan Pathan Fumes At Gautam Gambhir's Team India Leaks - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Irfan Pathan Criticizes Gautam Gambhir Over Team India Dressing Room Leaks

Publication Date: January 1, 2025 | Source: NDTV

The morning of New Year's Day saw explosive revelations about the dynamics within the Indian dressing room, where coach Gautam Gambhir expressed frustration over the team's performance amidst disagreements with BCCI selectors and captain Rohit Sharma. Irfan Pathan highlighted the importance of keeping dressing room matters confidential.

  • Gautam Gambhir reportedly furious about team disagreements.
  • Irfan Pathan advocates for confidentiality, stating, “What happens in the dressing room, should stay in the dressing room.”
  • Disputes arise over team selections and strategies post the defeat to Australia.
  • Pathan's cryptic message on social media reflects concern over public leaks.
“What happens in the dressing room, should stay in the dressing room!” — Irfan Pathan (@IrfanPathan) January 1, 2025

This situation highlights potential rifts in Team India that need careful handling to maintain unity and focus moving forward.

item.title: Easy Trip Planners share price down as CEO Nishant Pitti resigns citing personal reasons - Upstox
item.description:
Easy Trip Planners share price down as CEO Nishant Pitti resigns citing personal reasons

Date: January 01, 2025

Source: Easy Trip Planners News

Nishant Pitti has resigned as CEO of Easy Trip Planners due to personal reasons and has divested a 1.4% stake in the company.

  • Nishant Pitti's resignation is effective from January 01, 2025.
  • He divested a 1.4% stake for ₹78 crore, reducing his holding to 12.8%.
  • Rikant Pittie has been appointed as the new CEO of EasyMyTrip.
  • Easy Trip Planners' share price fell to ₹15.76, a 0.6% decline.
  • Pitti's previous divestment was a 14% stake for ₹920 crore in September 2023.
“The travel industry is at a transformative juncture where technology and personalisation are redefining how people explore the world,” said Rikant Pittie upon his appointment.

This change in leadership marks a significant adjustment for Easy Trip Planners as it continues to navigate the evolving travel market.

“It’s always exciting to see these two personalities in the same space.”

This event highlights the ongoing relationship and public engagement between prominent figures in tech and politics.

item.title: Heavy snowfall likely on higher reaches of J&K from Jan 4-6: MeT - Greater Kashmir
item.description:
Heavy Snowfall Expected in J&K from January 4-6

Date: January 01, 2023 | Source: Greater Kashmir

The Meteorological Centre Srinagar forecasts a fresh spell of snow starting this evening, anticipated to last until January 6th with peak activity expected from the night of January 4th to late January 5th.

  • Snowy weather conditions will persist intermittently.
  • Weather expected to improve late on January 6th.
  • A weak western disturbance will hit J&K till January 2nd, causing light snow at scattered places.
  • On January 3rd, generally cloudy weather with isolated light snow is expected.
  • Moderate to strong western disturbance will bring heavy snow to higher reaches between January 4th to 6th.
  • Travelers and tourists advised to plan accordingly due to icy road conditions.
“There is a possibility of heavy snow at isolated higher reaches during January 4th to 6th.”

This weather pattern may pose challenges for travelers and calls for awareness and adherence to local advisories.

Published on: [Insert Date Here] Source: [Insert Source Here]

Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal has sent a letter to RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat, questioning whether the RSS supports the BJP's policies and actions.

  • Kejriwal highlights issues of governance and public welfare.
  • He raises concerns about the distribution of money in politics.

“In a democratic setup, transparency is crucial for public trust,” said Kejriwal.

This dialogue indicates a growing tension between political entities and adds to the ongoing discussions about the role of political organizations in governance.

item.title: Gautam Gambhir Wanted Cheteshwar Pujara For Australia Tour. Here's What Happened Next - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Gautam Gambhir Wanted Cheteshwar Pujara For Australia Tour, Stunning Selection Details Emerge

Publication Date: Not specified Source: NDTV

Team India head coach Gautam Gambhir is at odds with the BCCI regarding team selection. Reports indicate Gambhir is frustrated with the team's performance and has advocated for the return of Test specialist Cheteshwar Pujara for the Australian tour.

  • Gambhir has faced challenges with team selection decisions made by the BCCI.
  • Despite India's victory in the Perth Test, Gambhir pushed for Pujara's inclusion.
  • Pujara, who has an average of 43.60 in 103 Test matches, hasn't played since the WTC final in 2023.
  • Gambhir's tenure has faced criticism regarding player performance and on-field execution.
Pujara is a veteran of 103 Test matches at an average of 43.60, and he played a key role in India's previous two series victories in Australia.

Gambhir's plea for Pujara reveals tensions in team dynamics and strategy as India navigates the Australia series.
